summary: The diff shows implementation of a global multi-language system with LanguageSelector component, LanguageContext provider, 10 translation JSON files (en, hi, bn, ta, te, mr, gu, kn, ml, ur), language switcher integrated in Header, and lazy loading infrastructure.
